verbLexeme: 1. To force air out of your nose through your nostrils in order to clean it. English = blow your nose.
2. To blow your nose using a handkerchief or tissue.
nominalLexeme: 1. A small square piece of fabric which you use for blowing your nose. English = handkerchief.
oldEntry: Popular explanation: wiping one's nose with a handkerchief.
